main.java.views

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.views.View

  • public class View
extends java.lang.Object
    Primarily used for defining and constructing a JFrame which then later is used for launching the application in full-screen exclusive mode. Contains draw, conversion and other methods.
    Author:
    Naichiri

    • Constructor Detail

      • View

        public View(Model m)
        The View constructor. Takes a reference to model so it can receive information straight from it about how to draw its objects.
        Parameters:
        m - reference to the model

        public static int toPixels(double var)
        Convertion method, translates model values to drawable pixels.
        Parameters:
        var - the variable that is to be translated
        Returns:
        the corresponding pixel value

      • render

        public void render()
        The main method of View. Clears the screen and draws the chosen objects. Also draws FPS. Then tidies up and readies for another loop.
